DOC.brief_summary: Determination of allergenicity of cat dander samples obtained before and after vaccinating the cat
DOC.brief_title: Skin Tests in Cat Allergic Patients With Cat Dander Samples Obtained Before and After Vaccinating the Cat
DOC.criteria: Informed Consent as documented by signature (Appendix Informed Consent Form) Male or female between 18 years to 65 years Confirmed cat allergy (positive skin prick test) Diseases or medications, influencing the skin tests or impairing the correct conduct and evaluation of the study History of anaphylactic reaction Pregnancy Skin irritations in test area Participation in another clinical trial within the last 30 days and during the present study
